title: Hands-on Team Lead / Senior Frontend Developer
description: Leading the Bird Inbox team while remaining hands-on in frontend development. Responsible for roadmap decisions, customer interactions, and driving product improvements. Focused on delivering scalable and efficient solutions for Bird AI CRM.

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: Led the migration of legacy PHP applications to a modern React/Remix stack within the Premium Services team. Improved performance, developer experience, and maintainability across multiple applications.

title: Engineering Manager
description: Managed a team of 5 engineers, fostering collaboration and efficient project delivery. Developed individual growth plans, implemented retention strategies, and worked closely with Product Managers to refine requirements. Focused on scalable solutions and data-driven approaches to track progress and mitigate risks.

title: Frontend Lead
description: Led and mentored a team of 12 frontend developers, establishing best practices and ensuring code quality. Focused on talent acquisition, professional development, and maintaining a productive, supportive team environment.

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: Contributed to multiple projects, developing React-based solutions while maintaining a legacy Angular.js application. Ensured high-quality code standards and best practices across frontend development.

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: Led frontend development for a new project, transitioning it to Angular 7. Designed and implemented responsive interfaces, collaborated closely with backend teams, and made key technical decisions to ensure seamless integration.

title: Senior Frontend Developer / Consultant
description: Worked on core projects for AXA Group Solutions, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable frontend solutions. Ensured seamless integration with backend systems and maintained high code quality through reviews and best practices.

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: Led the migration from Angular 1.x to Angular 2 for a Deloitte project, overseeing technical decisions and implementation. Provided knowledge transfer to new developers and maintained project stability through change requests and bug fixes.
